titles.title: For the relief of Benchmark Rail Group, Inc.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 104-359.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 2.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Hatch without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 436.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Requires the Director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency to compensate a named corporation for the emergency work and services performed by them after the Northridge earthquake.
